sentences.sContent: The president was lecturing the freshmen.
But over the next few months, one population will be at very high risk: college freshmen.
sentences.sContent_eng: But over the next few months, one population will be at very high risk: college freshmen.
sentences.sCn: 不过，在接下来的几个月里，有一群正处于这种高风险之中的人：大学新生。

sentences.sContent: Many of us know how easy it is to gain a few pounds. But over the next few months, one population will be at very high risk: college freshmen.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many of us know how easy it is to gain a few pounds. But over the next few months, one population will be at very high risk: college freshmen.
sentences.sCn: 我们都知道体重增加几磅是很容易的事。不过，在接下来的几个月里，有一群正处于这种高风险之中的人：大学新生。

synos.tran: 大学一年级新生；新手（freshman的复数）

trans.tranOther: In the United States, a freshman is a student who is in his or her first year at a high school or college
